remarks: If ` B ` is an interior point of ` C u. { B } ` relative to the domain ` A ` , then a limit point of ` F |`` C ` extends to a limit of ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2016.)
statement:
limcres.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
limcres.c $e |- ( ph -> C C_ A ) $.
limcres.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ CC ) $.
limcres.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
limcres.j $e |- J = ( K |`t ( A u. { B } ) ) $.
limcres.i $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( ( int ` J ) ` ( C u. { B } ) ) ) $.
limcres $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F |` C ) limCC B ) = ( F limCC B ) ) $.
